access: A small bathroom is available, as is a full kitchen.  There is no smoking allowed inside, only on the terrace outside.
additional_house_rules:
1.  Guests are required to remove their shoes upon entry to apartment.

2.  Smoking is allowed only on the terrace (no matter the weather) or additional fee will be incurred for smoking inside.  

3.  Common courtesy should be practiced with regard to noise during the evening hours (10pm-8am) no matter the week day; noise violations are not treated lightly given we live in close proximity to neighbors. 

4.  Violation of any of the house rules or damage to any property will result in full forfeit of the security deposit.  

5.  A lost key will incur a charge to replace it, and if lockout occurs after business hours or on weekends and hosts are not around the guest will be responsible for locksmith fees to gain entry.  

6.  We do not allow overnight guests for this shared common space.  No "sofa surfing" allowed.

In general please respect our home as you would your own.  Thank you!
description:
DAY USE ONLY!! Airy light-filled space for photo or video shoots, dinner party or small intimate gathering. Space includes living and dining area, kitchen, private bathroom and terrace facing World Trade Center.  Available on day by day basis, 8am-8pm (hours could be somewhat flexible). If need for 3 hours or less the price is $75 per hour. NO OVERNIGHT STAYS.

The living area of our loft-like apartment at the foot of the World Trade Center is sought after by photographers, videographers and others wishing to use the space for shoots or small intimate gatherings such as dinner parties. Prices are negotiable depending on size of the project. Starting price is $75 per hour (max 5 People)

PLEASE NOTE that this space is available only from morning to evening on the arrival day of the booking and NOT for overnight stays.  If you are interested in room accomodation please see our other listing here:  https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/3521318

A small bathroom is available, as is a full kitchen.  There is no smoking allowed inside, only on the terrace outside.

One of us will be onsite at all times to assist guests and ensure smooth operations.

We are down the street from One World Trade Center, with direct view from our terrace.

Nearly every subway line is within a block of two, many of them express trains, making transport to and from very easy and quick.

hosts.about:
Hi, we're your hosts Candace and Paul...and Callie our lovable and comedic Pembroke Welsh Corgi who will give you a warm welcome every time you walk in our door.  We love this city and introducing people to the numerous fantastic experiences in it.  We want our guests to feel like this is their home away from home, with the benefits of information from insiders who have lived here for decades.  

We love music, enjoy live acts and seeing the many international performers that visit NYC.  The modern art museums of the city are favorite spots as are the many fantastic restaurants to try.  We love to travel internationally and have visited many foreign lands.    And because we've traveled so extensively we've paid special attention to making things as easy and comfortable for our guests as possible.

We believe that life is short so enjoy it to the fullest until your time is up!

house_rules:
1.  Guests are required to remove their shoes upon entry to apartment.

2.  Smoking is allowed only on the terrace (no matter the weather) or additional fee will be incurred for smoking inside.  

3.  Common courtesy should be practiced with regard to noise during the evening hours (10pm-8am) no matter the week day; noise violations are not treated lightly given we live in close proximity to neighbors. 

4.  Violation of any of the house rules or damage to any property will result in full forfeit of the security deposit.  

5.  A lost key will incur a charge to replace it, and if lockout occurs after business hours or on weekends and hosts are not around the guest will be responsible for locksmith fees to gain entry.  

6.  We do not allow overnight guests for this shared common space.  No "sofa surfing" allowed.

In general please respect our home as you would your own.  Thank you!
